Reviews.Content: id hotel 1 beds incredibly comfortable 2 location thats care youre golden midst blocks union square makes incredibly convenient fortunately san fran days hotel sleep aside divas location concierge david wonderful personality reserving city tours public transportation etc helpful desk clerk christian incredibly snotty diva ironic considering overall opinion hotel delays airport weary arrived queen despite print reservation stating king accommodations requesting receive original reservation acted doing favor switching ridiculous mentioned hotel recently underwent facelift unfortunately diva look deluxe size difficult maneuver luggage move bathroom space toiletries left desk walls thin hear everythingthe people creaking halls bordering doors night finally diva boudoir includes vending machines ikea lounge seriously disappointing cleanliness im highmaintenance person expect provided clean towels sheets white sheets stained dinghy looking requested changed following morning replaced sheets looked dirty bathroom towels gray stained dirtylooking replaced apparently suite top floor diva maybe guests actually cleaner linens facelift doesnt theyve kept diva wasnt par price lost money entire stay roomed elsewhere vacation disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Great deal!”
Reviews.Author: iptam
Reviews.Content: stayed 2bedroom family studio 4 nights july am happy stay below comments 1 bigger expectation quiet facing car park 2 bed extremely comfy 3 bathroom towel am lazy bone usually wouldnt write reviews regardless hotel decided change time lot useful information users am feeling obligated share return oh review tripadvisorcom highly accurate

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”

Reviews.Content: pretty nice hotel location 2 blocks union square handy drop shopping walked ferry building pleasant 30 minute walk upgraded arrival bathroom bedroom lounge comfortable recommend stay free wifi fantastic rest stay surprised pay wifi hotels

Reviews.Title: “What a quirky place.... would go back again!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel diva 3 nights april visit sanfrancisco arrived san fran delayed flight uk diva train easy journey hotel location check quick upgraded signed personality perks programme prior trip 1st floor didnt view massive quirky design features unusual furniture tv wall comfortable bed infact comfy beds slept bath little clean functional anniversary hotel left bottle wine card nice touch hotel gym equipment jet lag awake 530am perfect time found busier hotel fresh coffee available morning floors help yourself starbucks attached hotel handy found diva centrally located restaurants shopping getting walks san francisco fab meal daily grill road diva nobhill cafe 1015 minutes walk loved san francisco definately stay diva

Reviews.Title: “Our new favorite place to stay in San Francisco”

Reviews.Content: ive san francisco times am shocked hotel price vs value recently stayed hotel diva yes similar 3 4 star hotels except clean bed super comfortable price low initially scared book payed 60night treated staff including free upgrade king id compare hotels previously ive paying 150night parking garage 60 steps north mason thats 27day vs hotel rates 35 45day wife agreed union square
